publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3301 Jackie Baillie: Free Football for Under-16s—That the Parliament welcomes the fact that Partick Thistle Football Club is encouraging young people under the age of 16 to become involved in football by enabling them to attend its home matches for free; believes that young people taking advantage of this initiative will develop a sense of belonging and loyalty to the club; recognises that offering free tickets in this way can attract a new generation of fans to help clubs to thrive in the future; praises Dumbarton Football Club for providing free tickets for home matches to the local junior clubs, and would encourage all football clubs to consider providing free tickets to under-16s. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-3301 Free Football for Under-16s (lodged on 26 January 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-3301 Free Football for Under-16s (lodged on 26 January 2009) Des McNulty*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Paul Martin*, Christine Grahame*, Kenneth Gibson*, David Whitton*, Helen Eadie*, Trish Godman*, Bill Butler*, Robert Brown*, Sarah Boyack*, Robin Harper*, Mary Mulligan*, Karen Gillon*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Sandra White*, Bob Doris*

S3M-3301 Jackie Baillie: Free Football for Under-16s—That the Parliament welcomes the fact that Partick Thistle Football Club is encouraging young people under the age of 16 to become involved in football by enabling them to attend its home matches for free; believes that young people taking advantage of this initiative will develop a sense of belonging and loyalty to the club; recognises that offering free tickets in this way can attract a new generation of fans to help clubs to thrive in the future; praises Dumbarton Football Club for providing free tickets for home matches to the local junior clubs, and would encourage all football clubs to consider providing free tickets to under-16s. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Des McNulty, Hugh O’Donnell, Paul Martin, Christine Grahame, Kenneth Gibson, David Whitton, Helen Eadie, Trish Godman, Bill Butler, Robert Brown, Sarah Boyack, Robin Harper, Mary Mulligan, Karen Gillon, Marilyn Livingstone, Sandra White, Bob Doris, Ken Macintosh*, John Park*, James Kelly*, Lewis Macdonald*
S3M-3301 Free Football for Under-16s (lodged on 26 January 2009) Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-3301 Free Football for Under-16s (lodged on 26 January 2009) Tom McCabe*, Gil Paterson*
